product_name: Giustaforza II Professional Ratchet Torque Wrench Kit
long_description: With precision and ease, the Giustaforza Professional Ratchet torque wrench kit offers controlled wrenching force for use with many of the smaller clamping bolts and screws used on bicycles.
short_description: With precision and ease, the Giustaforza Professional Ratchet torque wrench kit offers controlled wrenching force for use with many of the smaller clamping bolts and screws used on bicycles.
